arabicText: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	they	say,	“When	will	this	promise	come,	if	you	are	truthful?”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	kehte	haiñ	yeh	w’ada	kab	āayega	agar	tum	sachche	ho?

arabicText: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText: Proclaim,	“Surely	Allah	has	its	knowledge;	and	I	am	only	a	Herald	of	plain	warning.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	farmāo		yeh	‘ilm	to	Allah	ke	pās	hai	aur	maiñ	to	yehi	sāf	dar	sunāne	wāla

arabicText: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةًۭ سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	they	will	see	it	close,	the	faces	of	
the	disbelievers	will	become	ghastly,	and	it	
will	be	declared,	“This	is	what	you	were	
demanding.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	usey	pās	dekheñge	kāfiroñ	ke	
muñh	bigad	jāyeñ	ge	aur	unse	farmāya	
jāyega	yeh	hai	jo	tum	māñgte	they

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“What	is	your	
opinion	–Allah	may	either	destroy	me	and	
those	with	me,	or	have	mercy	on	us	–	so	
who	is	such	that	will	protect	the	
disbelievers	from	the	painful	
punishment?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	bhalā	dekho	to	agar	Allah	
mujhe	aur	mere	sāth	waloñ		ko	halāk	karde	
ya	ham	par	rahem	farmāye	to	woh	kaun	sa	
hai	jo	kāfiroñ	ko	dukh	ke	‘aƶāb	se	bachā	
lega?

arabicText: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“He	only	is	the	Most	Gracious	–	
we	have	accepted	faith	in	Him	and	have	
relied	only	upon	Him;	so	you	will	now	
realise	who	is	in	open	error.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	wohi	Rahmān	hai	ham	us	par	
Imān	lāye	aur	usi	par	bharosa	kiya	to	ab	
jān	jāoge	kaun	khuli	gumrāhi	meiñ	hai.

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًۭا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍۢ مَّعِينٍۭ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“What	is	your	opinion	-	if	in	the	
morning	all	your	water	were	to	sink	into	
the	earth,	then	who	is	such	who	can	bring	
you	water	flowing	before	you?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	bhalā	dekho	to	agar	subah	ko	
tumhāra	pāni	zameen	meiñ	dhans	jāye	to	
woh	kaun	hai	jo	tumheiñ	pāni	lā	de	nigah	
ke	sāmne	behta.

englishTranslationText:
Nuun*	-	by	oath	of	the	pen	and	by	oath	of	
what	is	written	by	it.		
(*Alphabets	of	the	Arabic	language;	Allah	and	
to	whomever	He	reveals,	know	their	precise	
meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Noon*	-	Qalam	aur	unke	likhe	ki	qasam	
(*Arabi	zabā	ka	harf	jis	ke	ma’ā	Allah	aur	jis	
par	Allah	ne	isko	Nazil	farmaya	Wahi	jānta	
hai)

englishTranslationText:
You	are	not	insane,	by	the	munificence	of	
your	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	apne	Rab	ke	fazl	se	majnoon	nahi
